Add Citations to an RMarkdown Document and Print Bibliography
========================================================

```{r setup, include = FALSE, cache = FALSE}
library("RefManageR")
bib <- ReadBib("TH.bib", check = FALSE)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "html", cite.style = "authoryear",
           bib.style = "numeric")
```
This is an R Markdown document. This is an example of a citation in the 
text `r Citet(bib, "Hapfelmeier_Hothorn_Riediger_2014")`. Now we cite in parentheses 
`r AutoCite(bib, "Zeileis_Hothorn_2013", before = "e.g., ")`.  

**References**

```{r results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
PrintBibliography(bib, .opts = list(check.entries = FALSE, sorting = "ynt"))
```
